help.main: [bold green]MLV-Lab CLI[/bold green]: Visual AI Learning Ecosystem.
help.list: List available units or environments from a specific unit.
help.train: Train an agent. If no seed is specified, a random one is generated.
help.eval: Evaluate an agent interactively by default; use --rec to record.
help.view: Launch the interactive view associated with an environment.
help.shell: Starts an interactive session (REPL) to run mlvlab commands.
help.help: Show technical specifications and documentation link for an environment.
help.docs: Show technical specifications and open documentation in browser.

config.no_config_file: No configuration file found. Using defaults.
config.key_value_required: Both key and value are required for 'set' action.
config.invalid_locale: Invalid locale. Use 'en' for English or 'es' for Spanish.
config.unknown_action: Unknown action: {action}. Use: get, set, or reset

messages.error_no_keymap: ‚ùå [bold red]Error:[/bold red] No key mapping found for {env_id}.
messages.no_seed_random: üå± No seed specified. Using random seed: [bold yellow]{seed}[/bold yellow]
messages.searching_last_training: ‚ÑπÔ∏è  No seed specified. Looking for latest training...
messages.use_list_unit: Use: [bold]list <unit>[/bold] to see environments from a unit (e.g. list ants)
messages.error_no_algorithm: ‚ùå Error: No reference algorithm defined for {env_id}.
messages.error_no_training: ‚ùå Error: No valid training found. Run 'train' first.
messages.error_cannot_extract_seed: ‚ö†Ô∏è Could not extract seed from folder name '{folder_name}'. Evaluation will use random map.
messages.error_cannot_start_view: ‚ùå [bold red]Error:[/bold red] Could not start view: {error}
messages.error_no_main_function: ‚ùå [bold red]Error:[/bold red] Module '{module_path}' does not expose main() function.
messages.game_started: Game started. Use the defined keys. ESC to exit.

options.seed: Seed for reproducibility (if not given, one is generated).
options.record: Record and generate evaluation video instead of just viewing.

repl.welcome: Welcome to the MLV-Lab interactive session.
repl.exit_tip: Type 'exit' or 'quit' (or press Ctrl+D) to exit.
repl.goodbye: Stay up to date with the latest news on our website. See you later!

shell.venv_not_found: Error: Virtual environment not found in '.venv'.
shell.starting: Starting a sub-shell inside the virtual environment...
shell.exit_tip: Type 'exit' to return to the original shell.

errors.player_entry_not_found: Error: Could not find player entry script on '{path}'
errors.play_launch_failed: Error: Failed to launch game mode: {error}
errors.view_script_not_found: Error: Could not find view file for module '{module_name}'
errors.train_entry_not_found: Error: Could not find training entry script on '{path}'
errors.train_launch_failed: Error: Failed to launch training mode: {error}
errors.eval_entry_not_found: Error: Could not find evaluation entry script on '{path}'
errors.eval_launch_failed: Error: Failed to launch evaluation mode: {error}

entry.no_keymap: Error: No keymap found for environment '{env_id}'.
entry.play_error: An error occurred during interactive play: {error}
entry.no_algorithm: Error: No algorithm defined for environment '{env_id}'.
entry.no_valid_training: Error: No valid training found for '{env_id}'.
